main event: An object approximately the size of a dime appeared to fall and explode over Indio, California on April 11, 1958.
interesting points: The object was observed from a loading automobile that the witness was in., The object was seen traveling fast from south to north., The sighting lasted for approximately one minute., The object exploded after about fifteen seconds of visibility., There were two jet aircraft reported in the area at the time.
sighted object: small object appearing to fall and explode
witness description: Givillian, Mr. Street, certified construction worker, age fifty-four
